Title: Creates the under-grounding of electrical power or telecommunications lines fund
Summary: Creates the under-grounding of electrical power or telecommunications lines fund to provide for the purpose of moving overhead electrical power or telecommunications lines underground from monies appropriated, including, but not limited to, any funds supplied by the Federal Emergency Management Agency for disaster recovery and hazard mitigation which may be used for state infrastructure repair.
LawCode: Add ยง99-pp, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to creating the under-grounding of electrical power or telecommunications lines fund
